name: Switchblock Dungeon (Nokia 3310 Jam 3)
description:
WASD - Move
J - Attack
H - Use/Switch
Escape - Title Screen/Exit

Switchblock dungeon is a little top-down game I made for Nokia Jam 3. It's the first game jam I've completed a game for, and actually the first game I've made which wasn't just following a tutorial. Unfortunately I didn't get around to adding sounds, and the actual gameplay isn't great. Also there's a ton of bugs.
